verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Weak and wounded sinner
Lost and left to die
O raise your head for
Love is passin' by
Come to Jesus
Come to Jesus
Come to Jesus and live

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now your burden's lifted
And carried far away
And precious blood has
washed away the stain
So sing to Jesus
Sing to Jesus
Sing to Jesus and live

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Like a newborn baby
Don't be afraid to crawl
And remember when you
walk sometimes we fall
So fall on Jesus
Fall on Jesus
Fall on Jesus and live

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sometimes the way is lonely
And steep and filled with pain
So if your sky is dark and pours the rain
Then cry to Jesus
Cry to Jesus
Cry to Jesus and live

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oh and when the love spills over
And music fills the night
And when you can't
contain your joy inside
Then dance for Jesus
Dance for Jesus
Dance for Jesus and live

verse.name: v6a
verse.lines:
And with your final heartbeat
Kiss the world good-bye
Then go in peace and
laugh on glory's side

verse.name: v6b
verse.lines:
And fly to Jesus
Fly to Jesus
Fly to Jesus and live
Fly to Jesus
Fly to Jesus
Fly to Jesus and live
